name: Ameet Talwalkar
content: Ameet Talwalkar Ameet Talwalkar Home Research Group Teaching Contact I am an associate professor in the Machine Learning Department at CMU and Chief Scientist at Datadog. My current research interests include AI for science, human-AI interaction, and developing specialized models and agents. Here is my Google scholar page and formal bio. Selected Recent Work This Time is Different: An Observability Perspective on Time Series Foundation Models (pdf, blog) B. Cohen, E. Khwaja, Y. Doubli, S. Lemaachi, C. Lettieri, C. Masson, H.
